argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zlmbas.w | |- W = ( ZMod ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_scaid | |- Scalar = Slot ( Scalar ` ndx ) |
| 3 |  | #P_5re | |- 5 e. RR |
| 4 |  | #P_5lt6 | |- 5 < 6 |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_ltneii | |- 5 =/= 6 |
| 6 |  | #P_scandx | |- ( Scalar ` ndx ) = 5 |
| 7 |  | #P_vscandx | |- ( .s ` ndx ) = 6 |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_neeq12i | |- ( ( Scalar ` ndx ) =/= ( .s ` ndx ) <-> 5 =/= 6 ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_mpbir | |- ( Scalar ` ndx ) =/= ( .s ` ndx ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_setsnid | |- ( Scalar ` ( G sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ZZring >. ) ) = ( Scalar ` ( ( G sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ZZring >. ) sSet <. ( .s ` ndx ) , ( .g ` G ) >. ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_zringring | |- ZZring e. Ring |
| 12 | 2 | #P_setsid | |- ( ( G e. V /\ ZZring e. Ring ) -> ZZring = ( Scalar ` ( G sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ZZring >. ) ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( G e. V -> ZZring = ( Scalar ` ( G sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ZZring >. ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .g ` G ) = ( .g ` G ) |
| 15 | 1, 14 | #P_zlmval | |- ( G e. V -> W = ( ( G sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ZZring >. ) sSet <. ( .s ` ndx ) , ( .g ` G ) >. ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( G e. V -> ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` ( ( G sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ZZring >. ) sSet <. ( .s ` ndx ) , ( .g ` G ) >. ) ) ) |
| 17 | 10, 13, 16 | #P_3eqtr4a | |- ( G e. V -> ZZring = ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
